医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
孟德尔随机化研究中优先考虑生物动机方法孟德尔随机化是医学研究中的一个强大工具，可以帮助我们了解某些因素是否真正导致疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Prioritizing-biologically-motivated-approaches-in-Mendelian-randomization-studies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Prioritizing-biologically-motivated-approaches-in-Mendelian-randomization-studies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=192b7d1d-ab11-4c99-931c-bc30f69fce90 Fri, 01 Mar 2024 23:38:37 -0500 Prioritizing biologically motivated approaches in Mendelian randomization studies
微生物特征与癌症免疫治疗反应相关微生物组可以识别那些受益于多种不同癌症联合免疫疗法的患者，包括罕见的妇科癌症、胆道癌和黑色素瘤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Microbial-signatures-linked-to-immunotherapy-response-across-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Microbial-signatures-linked-to-immunotherapy-response-across-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05e7fb81-0435-4312-98e0-236b9a56c7a9 Fri, 01 Mar 2024 21:47:34 -0500 Microbial signatures linked to immunotherapy response across cancers
探索吸烟对不同种族和族裔群体的表观遗传影响吸烟会改变基因的表达方式，从而导致肺癌和其他与吸烟有关的疾病的发展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Exploring-the-epigenic-impact-of-smoking-across-racial-and-ethnic-groups.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Exploring-the-epigenic-impact-of-smoking-across-racial-and-ethnic-groups.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b247fa8-e066-44d6-b059-a6e1a70b8687 Fri, 01 Mar 2024 16:33:00 -0500 Exploring the epigenetic impact of smoking across racial and ethnic groups
解开滤泡辅助 T 细胞的秘密，以制定更好的治疗策略滤泡辅助 T 细胞 (Tfh) 对于感染和疫苗接种过程中免疫系统产生的强烈抗体介导反应至关重要。然而，如果它们失控，可能会导致自身免疫、过敏或癌症等疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Unlocking-the-secrets-of-T-follillary-helper-cells-for-better-treatment-strategies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Unlocking-the-secrets-of-T-follillary-helper-cells-for-better-treatment-strategies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0c50c413-fff5-4a59-8998-8f551758019e Fri, 01 Mar 2024 16:24:00 -0500 Unlocking the secrets of T follicular helper cells for better treatment strategies
神经过度生长被认为是复发性尿路感染疼痛的原因对于复发性尿路感染 (UTI) 患者来说，一个令人困惑的问题是持续疼痛，即使在抗生素成功清除细菌后也是如此。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Nerve-overgrowth-identified-as-cause-of-pain-in-recurring-UTIs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Nerve-overgrowth-identified-as-cause-of-pain-in-recurring-UTIs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b205e2d-c7fd-4259-9322-e1e1ff4e0447 Fri, 01 Mar 2024 16:15:00 -0500 Nerve overgrowth identified as cause of pain in recurring UTIs
伦敦大学学院的研究强调了英国吸烟者对电子烟风险的误解伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，超过一半的英国吸烟者错误地认为电子烟比吸烟更有害或同样有害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/UCL-study-highlights-misconceptions-about-vaping-risks-among-English-smokers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/UCL-study-highlights-misconceptions-about-vaping-risks-among-English-smokers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6a6c3fbc-1ff5-4e71-bb48-bc4da12c014d Fri, 01 Mar 2024 16:05:00 -0500 UCL study highlights misconceptions about vaping risks among English smokers
揭示产生醛固酮的腺瘤的复杂细胞组成东京医科齿科大学 (TMDU) 的研究人员发现，构成产生醛固酮的腺瘤的细胞转录变得更加活跃，并且在瘤内分化过程中表达更高水平的与激素产生相关的基因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Unraveling-the-complex-cellular-composition-of-aldosterone-having-adenomas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Unraveling-the-complex-cellular-composition-of-aldosterone-having-adenomas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e5a7a91-9558-41f8-93ba-504f804011f4 Fri, 01 Mar 2024 15:55:00 -0500 Unraveling the complex cellular composition of aldosterone-producing adenomas
SLU 研究探讨逆境、精神和认知能力下降之间的关系圣路易斯大学公共卫生与社会正义学院健康管理与政策副教授 SangNam Ahn 博士最近在《临床心理学杂志》上发表了一篇论文，研究了童年逆境与精神衰退之间的关系成年后的逆境以及精神和认知能力的下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/SLU-study-examines-the-relationship- Between-adversity-psychiatric-and-cognitive-decline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/SLU-study-examines-the-relationship- Between-adversity-psychiatric-and-cognitive-decline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72cbe481-7a0d-4387-90d5-35e126d05fe2 Fri, 01 Mar 2024 15:48:00 -0500 SLU study examines the relationship between adversity, psychiatric and cognitive decline
受教育程度与延缓衰老和延长寿命有关哥伦比亚大学梅尔曼公共卫生学院的一项新研究表明，与那些没有获得向上教育流动的人相比，弗雷明汉心脏研究中获得较高教育水平的参与者往往衰老得更慢，并且寿命更长。罗伯特·N·巴特勒哥伦比亚老龄化中心。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Educational-attainment-linked-to-slower-aging-and-increased-longevity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Educational-attainment-linked-to-slower-aging-and-increased-longevity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ffa74949-40b9-45e4-9190-6cac71bd2b85 Fri, 01 Mar 2024 15:40:00 -0500 Educational attainment linked to slower aging and increased longevity
研究揭示有目的的步行对全髋关节置换术患者的好处伯恩茅斯大学科学家的一篇研究论文提出了一项随机试点试验，旨在确定以户外步行距离为目标的干预措施的效果，以增加老年人在术后 3 至 6 个月使用商业活动监测仪的日常活动。全髋关节置换术（THR）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Study-reveals-benefits-of- Purposeful-walking-for-total-hip-replacement-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240301/Study-reveals-benefits-of- Purposeful-walking-for-total-hip-replacement-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=76889366-d99d-40ec-8b83-6e0ea08db572 Fri, 01 Mar 2024 15:34:00 -0500 Study reveals benefits of purposeful walking for total hip replacement patients
